oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tips and Tricks for Common Medical and Surgical Procedures in Small Ruminants
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Van Metre, David C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: useful tips
South America
camelids
sheep
goats
field setting
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Every practitioner develops his or her own unique and efficient ways of doing things, and the author has collected a few of these tricks from personal experience, the veterinary literature, and veterinary technicians and practitioners. This presentation will include a variety of useful tips for a variety of commonly used procedures for South American camelids, sheep, and goats in a field setting.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2009; 116-119
